forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 64. West southwest wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. Southwest wind 3 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In the midst of an expansive afternoon, Downtown San Francisco basks under a gentle embrace of sunlight, with a high hovering near a comfortable 64 degrees. The light west-southwest breeze stirs refreshingly, sending the clean scent of sea air mingling with the urban essence of the city. Although some whispers of fog linger at the fringes, obscuring distant views, the clarity of the day invites you to venture outdoors. With the sun shining and the temperatures notably mild, the scene is decidedly pleasant, a canvas of blue stretching into the horizon, though hints of marine layers remind us of the city's coastal character.

As evening approaches, expect the skies to soften into a patchy quilt of clouds, cooling to around 54 degrees as the night draws in. This interplay of warmth and a gentle breeze suggests a layer or two may be wise—perhaps a light jacket or sweater to enjoy the leisurely twilight stroll or perhaps dine alfresco in one of the many inviting cafes lining the streets. Whether one chooses to wander the vibrant neighborhoods or simply pause to take in the city’s unique charm, the day unfolds with a myriad of modest delights waiting to be discovered.
